title: github
content: # `fastmcp.server.auth.providers.github` GitHub OAuth provider for FastMCP. This module provides a complete GitHub OAuth integration that's ready to use with just a client ID and client secret. It handles all the complexity of GitHub's OAuth flow, token validation, and user management. Example: ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} from fastmcp import FastMCP from fastmcp.server.auth.providers.github import GitHubProvider # Simple GitHub OAuth protection auth = GitHubProvider( client_id="your-github-client-id", client_secret="your-github-client-secret" ) mcp = FastMCP("My Protected Server", auth=auth) ``` ## Classes ### `GitHubProviderSettings` Settings for GitHub OAuth provider. ### `GitHubTokenVerifier` Token verifier for GitHub OAuth tokens. GitHub OAuth tokens are opaque (not JWTs), so we verify them by calling GitHub's API to check if they're valid and get user info. **Methods:** #### `verify_token` ```python theme={"theme":{"light":"snazzy-light","dark":"dark-plus"}} verify_token(self, token: str) -> AccessToken | None ``` Verify GitHub OAuth token by calling GitHub API. ### `GitHubProvider` Complete GitHub OAuth provider for FastMCP. This provider makes it trivial to add GitHub OAuth protection to any FastMCP server. Just provide your GitHub OAuth app credentials and a base URL, and you're ready to go. Features: * Transparent OAuth proxy to GitHub * Automatic token validation via GitHub API * User information extraction * Minimal configuration required
